overview: A film about director Andja Arnebäck's family: “When I was pregnant with my first child and doing ultrasound, I thought about the coincidence that my child and I both exist. My Mom has told me that they wanted to forcibly sterilize my grandmother. Through archives and in meetings with my grandmother's two brothers, Axel and Knut, I investigate what really happened when they grew up in Gothenburg. ”
title: Walborgs ungar
